description: Vite <7.3.0 allowed public directory traversal when symlinks and network exposure were present.
mdast-util-to-hast <13.2.1 could inject unsanitized classes in rendered markdown.
js-yaml <4.1.1 vulnerable to prototype pollution when parsing untrusted YAML.
glob CLI <10.5.0 allowed command injection through -c/--cmd.
ai <5.0.52 permitted filetype whitelist bypass on uploads.
resolution: Upgraded ai to 5.0.115 and aligned zod peer version.
